features: For your kitchen: Store fruits and vegetables, serve salads, and your culinary delights in the wooden bowls for food. The wooden fruit bowls make a good fit for kitchens, barbecues, and parties.
Beautiful holder: Our large wooden bowls are a good addition to your hallway, bedroom, or living room. Use wood bowls decorative as a holder and organizer for keys and other small necessary items.
Easy to style: Wooden serving bowl is an attractive, stylish accent for your comfort. Thanks to its appearance and convenient size, the bowls for centerpieces suit any interior and design project.
Lightweight wood decorative bowl: Sustainable rustic wooden bowls are easy to carry and wash. It is a light and durable alternative to plastic dishes.
Worth the price: The decorative fruit bowl is made of high-quality and solid wood. The natural texture and neutral color of the large wood bowl will create an atmosphere of a cozy home.
body.description: Add a cozy detail to your home with BOLTCORRSE Decorative Bowl. Neutral design. Natural color and texture, convenient size of the decorative bowls will successfully fit into any interior. Use the dough bowls for decor to store fruit, serve meals, or organize household items. Solid wood. Natural and beautiful decorative bowls for home decor are made of durable wood. It is lightweight, so you can take it to the BBQ and use a wooden salad bowl at a picnic or a party. Easy to clean. Thanks to the ergonomic shape, the decorative shallow bowls are easy to wash and use again. With natural materials and easy care, your decorative kitchen bowls will serve you for a long time. Stylish storage. Place handmade wood bowls in the kitchen to store the food in. Use it in the hall to keep your shelves in order. Add a stylish accent to your living room. All your things will be in their places along with the large decorative bowl. It’s a bargain. Natural materials, high quality, good design - all in one and at an attractive price. We are doing our best so that you can say that the decorative bowls for coffee table are worth their price. Order BOLTCORRSE Wood Serving Bowl now and add a cozy accent to your home!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect centerpiece tray!
reviews.reviewText: Great quality tray to be used as a centerpiece. Can be used as a serving tray, moss tray, or even to store keys. Love the light ivory color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute but watch your fingers!!
reviews.reviewText: The size is perfect for a key and wallet bowl and it’s also cute at the same time! The only thing is that the wood does cause some splinters so I would sand it down if I were you. But other than that you should get it if you need a key bowl.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If your room needs a heavy, human made bowl, this is the one for you!
reviews.reviewText: 100/100This is a huge hunk of wood hand carved into a chunky bowl. Very primitive. Very human. This wasn’t done on some big impersonal machine . . . another human’s hands formed and shaped this bowl.There’s really not much more to say. It’s not a fine finished article. It’s a rough, crude, unfinished bowl for holding fruit or bread or flowers or whatever you want to put in it.Ultimately, is it worth the price? Yes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice unfinished bowl!
reviews.reviewText: The bowl I received looks very much like those depicted in the item description. The wood is slightly rough to the touch, but not splintery like some other Paulownia wood items I've ordered. It feels like it was buffed with a medium grit sandpaper, so you get that rustic look and feel, but not the splinters. There is no stain or wax treatment, just raw unfinished wood that welcomes you to run your hands over it. I think this would make a great gift, especially if used as the base of a gift "basket". I originally intended to gift this one, but it's staying with me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very lightweight, great accessory bowl
reviews.reviewText: My wife commandeered this bowl as soon as I took it out of the box. It's evidently a near-perfect match for another set of decorative bowls she has from a name-brand home decor store, and she's using it as a complimenting piece for various needs. The latest use is as a coffee pod bowl for visiting company, but I'm sure as soon as they've left it'll become a key bowl by the front door, or a fruit bowl on the counter.It's about 12" across, rough finished and rustic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars nice little bowl
reviews.reviewText: Love this. The weight is amazing (super light weight) even though it's thicker. The color and wood grain is gorgeous and it's just a really nice bowl. Very happy with this and how it adds to our decor!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a beautiful piece!
reviews.reviewText: The finish of this bowl is super smooth and it doesn't smell like anything toxic. I love how spacious it is as well. You could use it for a variety of things but I'm personally using it to hold miscellaneous things when I first enter my home. I highly recommend this product if your looking for a cute modern looking bowl that doesn't smell like treated wood or anything at all really.
